Key Match Events: The Dallas Mavericks beat the Portland Trail Blazers 117-110 on January 10, 2025, despite the absence of Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving.
Dereck Lively II led the Mavericks' rally with 13 points in the final frame.
The Mavericks overcame a 10-point deficit late in the fourth quarter.
Quentin Grimes' floater capped off a 16-0 run, pushing the Mavericks ahead 115-109.
Anfernee Simons went 0-of-4 and committed two turnovers in the last four minutes.
Shaedon Sharpe went 0-of-2, committing three fouls and two turnovers in the final minutes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dallas Mavericks won the season series 3-1 against the Portland Trail Blazers.
The Mavericks improved to 22-16 following the win, while the Trail Blazers dropped to 13-24.
